mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT tsr.permission FROM t_sys_user tsu LEFT JOIN t_sys_user_role tsur ON tsu.id = tsur.user_id LEFT JOIN t_sys_role_resource tsrr ON tsrr.role_id = tsur.role_id LEFT JOIN t_sys_resource tsr ON tsr.id = tsrr.id WHERE tsu.username = #{username} AND tsr.permission IS NOT NULL AND tsr.permission <> ''
